isis.stitle: 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES FS-5106 AND FS-6206 - INSTALL - MAINSHAFT

step1.para: Use a sling around the 3rd-4th synchronizer to carefully lower mainshaft into case ( Figure 113).

figure.caption: Figure 113. Use Sling Around 3rd-4th Synchronizer to Lower Mainshaft into Case

step1.para: Use a sleeve type driver to install bearing on input shaft ( Figure 114).

figure.caption: Figure 114. Use Sleeve Type Driver to Install Bearing on Input Shaft

step1.para: Install input shaft by aligning clutching teeth on main drive gear with teeth in 5th speed synchronizer cup ( Figure 115).
Coat outer diameter of input shaft bearing cover oil seal with Loctite 510. Install seal with flanged driver as shown ( Figure 116). Install input shaft bearing race (inset).

figure.caption: Figure 116. Install Seal and Input Shaft Bearing Race

step1.para: Install input shaft bearing cover and gasket ( Figure 117). Apply Loctite 262 to threads of bolts and tighten to 15 to 20 ft-lbs (20 to 27 N · m).

figure.caption: Figure 117. Install Input Shaft Bearing Cover and Gasket

note.para: Top of bearing cover is marked "TOP" for proper installation.

step1.para: Install speedometer drive gear or rotor on output shaft ( Figure 118).

figure.caption: Figure 118. Install Speedometer Drive Gear or Rotor

step1.para: If necessary, install rear bearing race (inset, Figure 119). Temporarily install shims and rear bearing cover. Tighten nuts to 60 to 70 ft-lbs. (81 to 95 N · m).

figure.caption: Figure 119. Install Rear Bearing Race, and Temporarily Install Shims and Rear Bearing Cover

note.para: Top of bearing cover is marked "TOP" for proper installation.

step1.para: Place transmission in a vertical position as shown ( Figure 120). Install yoke and nut. Tighten yoke nut to 300 to 350 ft-lbs. (407 to 475 N · m). Rotate input shaft and mainshaft to seat bearings and races.

figure.caption: Figure 120. Place Transmission in Vertical Position and Install Yoke and Nut

step1.para: Position dial indicator as shown ( Figure 121). Pry up on output shaft to measure end play. End play must be set at .006 to .010 inch (0.15 to 0.25 mm) min. Add shims for more end play; remove shims for less end play.

note.para: Once end play is correct, remove yoke and rear bearing cover and apply a light coat of Loctite 510 to both sides of shims.

step1.para: Install rear seal using a flanged driver ( Figure 122).
Install rear bearing cover ( Figure 123). Tighten nuts to 60 to 70 ft-lbs. (81 to 95 N · m). Top of rear bearing cover is marked for proper installation.
